bill_title: Congratulating the Sioux Falls Washington High School Highsteppers on the success of their dance team in 2006.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Congratulating the Sioux Falls Washington High School Highsteppers on the success of their dance team in 2006. WHEREAS, the Washington High School Highsteppers worked and trained hard for their 2006 season; and WHEREAS, the team showed tremendous improvement, both athletically and academically, throughout the season; and WHEREAS, Coach Angela Nieman urged the team to be at their best in good times and in bad; and WHEREAS, the team members were the 2006 Grand Champions at the United Performing Association's National Competition: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Washington High School Highsteppers be honored for their achievements as a dance team in 2006.
